Title: Relates to automated defibrillator requirements
Summary: Requires every assisted living facility to have at least one automated external defibrillator on the premises and have in attendance at all times, at least one employee certified in CPR.
LawCode: Amd ยง4656, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to automated external defibrillator requirements
